title: Flappy Dunk
description: Flappy Dunk is a casual basketball game where you tap to propel the ball through hoops, earning points and unlocking new balls along the way. The game seamlessly blends simple one-touch controls with a challenging gameplay that's easy to grasp but hard to master. Perfect for basketball enthusiasts of all ages, Flappy Dunk keeps the excitement alive with its unique theme and a continuous stream of fresh challenges as you progress.
